title: HP Raises Annual Profit Outlook, Despite Impact of Russian Sanctions
sub_head: The PC and printer maker sees small earnings hit in current quarter from Ukraine crisis
body:
HP Inc. raised its annual profit outlook, boosted by strong sales of computers to businesses, but warned that Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine would dent its bottom line this quarter.
The company estimated a hit of 2 cents to 3 cents to its per-share profit this quarter related to the invasion of Ukraine.
